experience.etablissement: Ministry of National Education of Madagasikara

project.desc1: Led the migration of Banky Foiben'i Madagasikara's intranet platform from Symfony 3.4 to Symfony 6.4, ensuring better performance, enhanced security, and improved maintainability. This upgrade involved adapting legacy code, updating dependencies, and implementing best practices to optimize the system for long-term stability
